name: @holochain-scaffolding/lit
description: Generator of webhapps with Lit as its main framework
author: guillem.cordoba@gmail.com

scripts.test: rimraf tests/.fixture && npm run build && node --loader ts-node/esm --experimental-specifier-resolution=node tests/index.ts | tap-diff && cd tests/.fixture && nix-shell -I nixpkgs=https://github.com/NixOS/nixpkgs/archive/nixos-21.11.tar.gz -p niv --run "niv init && niv drop nixpkgs && niv drop niv && niv add -b main holochain/holonix" && nix-shell --run "npm install && npm run package"  && rimraf tests/.fixture
